ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Questions....
ygData.msgSnippet: On Tue, 12 Sep 2000 14:48:35 -0600, (Zhian)  ... *delurk* I tested this myself a while ago and I seem to recall that for the most part
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 12 Sep 2000 14:48:35 -0600, "(Zhian)" <vtemplarv@...>
wrote:

>Well, after the wonderful responces to my previous question, I have more for
>you. =)
>
>1) Is an Agnostic DE Enchanter KoS in Erudin?
>I was late getting beck to the office over lunch and had just received the
>Erud's Tonic from the Erudite in the library using illusion Halfelf and
>Alliance. I am "parked" in front of the illusion merchant on the 2nd floor
>and bound at the wood bridge in NK.

*delurk*

I tested this myself a while ago and I seem to recall that for the
most part I wasn't KoS there. I didn't check every NPC in Erudin, but
I remember being safe near the guards. Unless faction has changed
recently, you should be ok.

But just to confuse things, watch out if there are any visiting snooty
elves around. I think I spotted one somewhere, may have been the
enchanter guild. All the normal erudites were dubious to me. There's
a sneaky high elf sitting up there that is KoS, so be careful.

*re-lurk*

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (48) <approaching retirement>
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt

Kalara, Dark Elf Enchanter (29)
Dying at a venue near you soon.

Mith Marr server
